QuestData.Title: Of Fire and Thunder
QuestData.Description: The Iron Wolf... brought weapons...$B$B<cough>$B$B...weapons of fire and thunder.$B$BOur warriors have never seen such weapons. We were not ready.$B$B<wheeze> We must learn... to overcome...
QuestData.LogDescription: Examine the Siege Munitions and Heavy Plating in The Boneslag.
QuestData.RewardText: <Thunderlord apprentices toil under the watchful eye of Blackrock orcs.$B$BUsing lava pools as natural forges, they craft components for a type of weapon never before seen by the Frostwolves: cannons.>
